p: The β-glucan content of the wild mushrooms ranged from 10.50 g/100 g DM in Macrolepiota procera to 34.97 g/100 g DM in Tricholoma portentosum ( Table 1). Among the commercial mushrooms, the lowest β-glucan content was found in Agaricus bisporus (11.36 g/100 g DM) and the highest in Pleurotus ostreatus (40.34 g/100 g DM) ( Table 1).
